heading: HB05972
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FREE LEGAL ASSISTANCE TO ANY OFFICER ENLISTED PERSONNEL OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE ON ANY CHARGE BEFORE THE PROSECUTOR'S OFFICE, COURT OR ANY COMPETENT BODY ARISING FROM AN INCIDENT RELATED TO THE PERFORMANCE OF OFFICIAL DUTY
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2020-01-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05972
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FREE LEGAL ASSISTANCE TO ANY OFFICER ENLISTED PERSONNEL OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE ON ANY CHARGE BEFORE THE PROSECUTOR'S OFFICE, COURT OR ANY COMPETENT BODY ARISING FROM AN INCIDENT RELATED TO THE PERFORMANCE OF OFFICIAL DUTY
